creator: XRAI
descriptionHtml:
XRAI Glass enriches everyday conversation by subtitling life and augmenting your reality.

Our award-winning app converts audio into visuals, turning your speech into subtitles in real-time. Connect with friends, collaborate with colleagues, and never miss a moment with XRAI Glass.

Featured in Forbes, Financial Times, CNN, World Economic Forum, BBC, Wired and more, XRAI Glass works seamlessly with the next generation of smart glasses - so you can subtitle the world, no matter where you are.

Real-time Transcription
• Transcribe conversations instantly with the tap of a button
• Cloud-enhanced transcription for faster and more accurate subtitles
• Identify speakers with diarization (selected providers)
• Available on your phone, tablet, TV, or smart glasses
• Offline transcription options
• Multiple subtitling engines

Instant Translation 
• Translate between over 140+ languages and dialects
• Easily switch between languages from the quick menu
• Connect with people from around the world

Made for Augmented Reality
• Works seamlessly with the next generation of smart glasses
• Compatible with Rokid Max, XREAL Air, TCL NXTWEAR S, and more
• Pin, move, and adjust subtitles in 3D space
• Available to use without smart glasses

Personal AI Assistant
• Summarize conversations
• Ask questions and receive instant responses
• Find the best places to visit on holiday
• See what the weather is doing today
• Powered by ChatGPT

Accessibility First
• Bionic reading options
• Adjustable font scaling and distance
• Bluetooth microphone compatible
• Dark and light theme options
• Multiple audio sources
• Fast speech to text

Infinite Possibilities
• Real-time captioning for the deaf and hard of hearing
• Live transcription for lectures, seminars, and talks
• Voice notes for individuals with APD and ADHD
• Automatic meeting notes for businesses
• Conversation history for quick reminders

Organise & Share
• Manage your conversation history
• Share transcripts and audio recordings
• Search for previous conversations
• Delete old transcripts

Built with your privacy in mind - all conversations are stored directly on your phone, and the only person with access to them is you.

Download now for free and start subtitling your life, available on Android and iOS.

-

“More than just a gadget, the technology helps those suffering from a range of health issues” - Wired
"A revolutionary way to help deaf individuals participate in real-time conversations" - FOX News
"Revolutionary new glasses allow deaf people to 'see' conversations" - Bloomberg
"This is what AR is made for" - Meta

-

"Tech For Good Award" - Global Business Tech Awards (2023)
"Startup Tech Company of the Year" - National Technology Awards (2023)
"Best Assistive Technology App" - Assistive Technology Awards (2023)
“Best Captioning Tech” - Hearing Tech Innovator Awards (2023)

-

Need help? Visit our knowledgebase: https://xrai.glass/knowledge

Privacy Policy: https://xrai.glass/privacy
Terms of Use: https://xrai.glass/legal

-

Support languages for transcription and translation:
Afrikaans, Amharic, Arabic (Gulf, Modern Standard), Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese (Cantonese, Jilu Mandarin, Mandarin, Simplified, Southwestern Mandarin, Taiwanese Mandarin, Traditional, Wu), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (Australian, British, Indian, Irish, New Zealand, Scottish, South African, US, Welsh), Estonian, Farsi, Filipino, Finnish, French (Canadian), Galician, Georgian, German (Swiss), Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi (Indian), Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Marathi, Mongolian, Norwegian Bokmål, Nepali, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Zulu.
